subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Awaiting the imminent birth of his first child, Dontrelle Willis went about his business last night by pitching six and two-thirds innings and hitting a standup triple to help the Florida Marlins defeat the visiting Atlanta Braves, 8-7.
snippet: Awaiting the imminent birth of his first child, Dontrelle Willis went about his business last night by pitching six and two-thirds innings and hitting a standup triple to help the Florida Marlins defeat the visiting Atlanta Braves, 8-7.
